publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1440 Murdo Fraser: 80th Anniversary of Gleneagles Hotel-That the Parliament congratulates Gleneagles Hotel on its 80th anniversary; wishes it continued success as being one of the world's most prestigious hotels, and looks forward to it continuing to welcome royalty, movie legends and sporting greats from throughout the world to Perthshire so that they can appreciate the local hospitality and Perthshire's natural beauty and heritage.
S2M-1440 80th Anniversary of Gleneagles Hotel (lodged on 8 June 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-1440 Murdo Fraser: 80th Anniversary of Gleneagles Hotel-That the Parliament congratulates Gleneagles Hotel on its 80th anniversary; wishes it continued success as being one of the world's most prestigious hotels, and looks forward to it continuing to welcome royalty, movie legends and sporting greats from throughout the world to Perthshire so that they can appreciate the local hospitality and Perthshire's natural beauty and heritage. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith
